metadata.title: CVE-2024-4472 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.5 prior to 17.1.7, starting from 17.2 prior to 17.2.5, and startingfrom 17.3 prior to 17.3.2, where dependency proxy credentials are retainedin graphql Logs.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
